text: tatha tumhaare lie jal ka shikaar aur usaka khaady[1] halaal (vaidh) kar diya gaya hai, tumhaare tatha yaatriyon ke laabh ke lie tatha tumapar thal ka shikaar jab tak ehraam kee sthiti mein raho, haraam (avaidh) kar diya gaya hai aur allaah (kee avagya) se darate raho, jisakee or tum sabhee ekatr kiye jaoge
